subject: The Internet Patrol -  But Mom, All the Cool PPL Say "ppl"!
body:
The Internet Patrol


 The Internet Patrol
http://www.theinternetpatrol.com

But Mom, All the Cool PPL Say "ppl"!

Yesterday we were trolling through our logs, and we found that someone had come to our site using this search query:  "find out where ppl logged into your paypal account."  I kid you not.  And it turns out that a lot of people search for items on the Internet using the term "ppl", and expect to find useful information.  Terms like  cool ppl, naked ppl, gay ppl, fat ppl, hot ppl, ppl at the beach (they must be the hot ppl), short ppl, and even Lego ppl.  Do they find that useful information?  I'm sure they find the information they deserve.
 

Read more here: But Mom, All the Cool PPL Say \ufffdoeppl\u201d! 

Please visit http://www.TheSiteForTheCure.com !  Pretty please??
